homePageAlert.title: Beyond Behaviors: An innovative approach to challenging behavior
homePageAlert.content: Here is a link to a presentation I recently gave on #BeyondBehaviors. We now understand so much about how the brain and body work together to respond to safety vs danger. From my perspective, this approach to challenging behavior from Mona Delahooke, Ph.D. is the most aligned with this understanding. here
AboutMe: I offer compassionate support grounded in systemic and client-centered approaches.
AboutHelp: I'm here to help using various tools
